title: It looks similar to Superdry
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150424041856im_/http:/typophile.com/files/husband%20since%202014_4455.jpg)

Hi, Has anybody come across this font before? It looks similar to the Superdry logo but it's not the same font. I don't want to copy the SuperDry brand. This is for a sample to go onto garments to be sold at a wedding fayre.

Many Thanks
author: Blueprint Designs

comments.content: Could be Maelle.K's [Wolf In The City](http://web.archive.org/web/20150424041856/http:/www.dafont.com/wolf-in-the-city.font) with a customized /H...
